sources.table: (SELECT fli.person_id, fli.hiv_viral_load as vl_1, fli.test_datetime as vl_1_date FROM etl.flat_labs_and_imaging fli INNER JOIN (SELECT person_id, MAX(test_datetime) AS max_vl_1_date,max(encounter_id) as encounter_id FROM etl.flat_labs_and_imaging fli where fli.hiv_viral_load is not null GROUP BY person_id) max_dates ON fli.person_id = max_dates.person_id AND fli.encounter_id = max_dates.encounter_id)

join.joinCondition: fli.person_id = hmsd.person_id and fli.vl_1 is not null

expressionOptions.expression: date_format(hmsd.enrollment_date,'%d-%m-%Y')
date_format(hmsd.arv_first_regimen_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y')
date_format(hmsd.arv_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y')
date_format(fli.vl_1_date,'%d-%m-%Y')

columns.column: IF(hmsd.tb_screened_active_this_month = 1 and hmsd.presumed_tb_positive_this_month = 0 AND hmsd.tb_screening_datetime between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') and endDate and hmsd.started_ipt_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)

expressionOptions.expression: IF(hmsd.ipt_completion_date between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') and endDate and hmsd.ipt_start_date is not null AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is not null AND status = 'active',1,0)
IF(hmsd.ipt_start_date between date_format((DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)),'%Y-%m-01') and DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND month(hmsd.ipt_completion_date) = month(endDate),1,0)

IF(hmsd.tb_screened_active_this_month = 1 and hmsd.presumed_tb_positive_this_month = 0 AND hmsd.tb_screening_datetime between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') and endDate and hmsd.ipt_start_date is not null AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is null and hmsd.ipt_stop_date is not null AND status = 'active',1,0)
IF(on_ipt_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)

IF(hmsd.tb_screened_active_this_month = 1 and hmsd.presumed_tb_positive_this_month = 0 AND hmsd.tb_screening_datetime between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') and endDate and on_ipt_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)

IF(hmsd.tb_screened_active_this_month = 1 and hmsd.presumed_tb_positive_this_month = 0 AND hmsd.tb_screening_datetime between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') and endDate and (on_ipt_this_month = 0 or on_ipt_this_month is null) and hmsd.ipt_start_date is null AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is null and hmsd.ipt_stop_date is null AND status = 'active' ,1,0)
IF(hmsd.encounter_date between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') and endDate AND hmsd.tb_screening_datetime between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') and endDate and status = 'active',1,0)
IF(hmsd.encounter_date between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') AND endDate AND hmsd.tb_screening_datetime between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') and endDate and status = 'active',1,0)

columns.column: IF(hmsd.active_in_care_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active' and ( (hmsd.ipt_start_date is not null AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is not null) or (hmsd.ipt_start_date is null AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is not null) or (hmsd.ipt_start_date is not null AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is null) ) ,1,0)
IF(hmsd.active_in_care_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active' and hmsd.ipt_start_date is null AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is null,1,0)
IF(hmsd.ipt_start_date between date_format((DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 12 MONTH)),'%Y-%m-01') and DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 12 MONTH) AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is not null,1,0)
IF(hmsd.visit_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active' AND hmsd.tb_screening_datetime not between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') and endDate,1,0)
IF(hmsd.tb_screened_active_this_month = 1 and hmsd.presumed_tb_positive_this_month = 0 AND hmsd.tb_screening_datetime between date_format(endDate,'%Y-%m-01') and endDate AND status = 'active',1,0)

expressionOptions.expression: IF (hmsd.active_in_care_this_month  = 1 AND hmsd.tb_screened_active_this_month != 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)
IF (hmsd.active_in_care_this_month  = 1 AND hmsd.on_ipt_this_month = 0 AND hmsd.on_tb_tx_this_month = 0 AND status = 'active',1,0)
IF (hmsd.on_art_this_month  = 1 AND hmsd.tb_screened_active_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)
IF (hmsd.on_art_this_month  = 1 AND hmsd.tb_screened_active_this_month != 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)
IF (hmsd.tb_screening_datetime between DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) and endDate AND  hmsd.on_art_this_month  = 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)
IF (hmsd.tb_screening_datetime < DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND hmsd.on_art_this_month  = 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)

columns.column: IF(hmsd.ipt_start_date between date_format((DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 12 MONTH)),'%Y-%m-01') and DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 12 MONTH),1,0)
IF(hmsd.ipt_start_date between date_format((DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)),'%Y-%m-01') and DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH),1,0)

caseOptions.condition: hmsd.ipt_start_date between date_format((DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)),'%Y-%m-01') and DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is not null

hmsd.ipt_start_date between date_format((DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)),'%Y-%m-01') and DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND hmsd.ipt_stop_date is not null AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is null
hmsd.ipt_start_date between date_format((DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)),'%Y-%m-01') and DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND status = 'transfer_out' AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is null

hmsd.ipt_start_date between date_format((DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)),'%Y-%m-01') and DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND (status = 'defaulter' or status = 'ltfu') AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is null
hmsd.ipt_start_date between date_format((DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)),'%Y-%m-01') and DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND status = 'dead' AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is null

hmsd.ipt_start_date between date_format((DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)),'%Y-%m-01') and DATE_SUB(endDate, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND hmsd.ipt_completion_date is null AND hmsd.ipt_stop_date is null AND status = 'active'

expressionOptions.expression: IF(hmsd.started_art_this_month = 1 AND hmsd.started_ipt_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)
IF(hmsd.on_art_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active' AND hmsd.started_ipt_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)
IF(hmsd.on_ipt_this_month = 1 AND hmsd.on_art_this_month = 1 AND status = 'active',1,0)
IF(hmsd.on_art_this_month = 1 AND hmsd.tb_screening_datetime is not null AND status = 'active',1,0)
